name: Lifebound
description:
This is my entry for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 ! The theme was "Stronger Together" so I came up with this concept of a Platformer/Metroidvania where you could bewitch the monsters and play as them.

How to play
Controls

  • A/D : Move
  • Space : Jump, Double Jump, Hover (hold)
  • Left Click : Attack
  • Right Click : Secondary Attack (Bind / Dash)
  • S : Quick Fall
  • W : Enter
  • Q/E : Switch Character (Previous/Next)
  • 1 -> 4 : Switch Character (shortcut)

I advise you to play the game in fullscreen !

Tips

  • The Snake Monster is a fast creature that can dash and do swift melee attacks. Beware of its speed if it's chasing you !
  • The Juggernaut is a heavy undead creature that doesn't bulge much when attacked. It can perform powerful melee attacks and quickly strike down opponents.
  • The Fire Fury is a powerful demon that can cast quick spells to strike down its foes. It can double jump and hover to unleash a series of projectiles from above.
  • If an area seems unreachable to you, try using the agility of some monsters.
  • Look out for cracks in the walls ! You will most likely find some health or some new paths by destroying these cracked blocks.

Credits

A game by Simon Branstett / TheAppleCake
